attributes.action: Amend the adoption law in N Ireland so that adoptees have the right to access their adoption files and the same rights as birth children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adoptees who have been adopted in N Ireland do not have the right to access their adoption files  They are unable to trace their nationality and in the case of illegal adoptions unable to get any details whatsoever of their adoption  The law in N Ireland should be updated as soon as possible and adoptees should be given some input when these decisions which are so far reaching and traumatic for them are put into force
